column4: I have just installed 10.04 and after reboot just get blank screen with a blinking cursor. How to solve this?
Anyone knows how to get past the blank screen with a blinking cursor after installation and reboot?
having the same problem, it works sometimes after just rebooting on the powerbutton
I've tried 5 times and then it did work, but now I'm having the same problem again. Its reeaaally fast when it boots, but for the moment it doesn't work for me neither, something is wrong
what video card you have and how many displays?
think I talked to you yesterday, just a blinkin _ when booting
i've solved it. how many HDDs you have?
But it seems to be a problem with the hdd, but I don't know what pronblem
my problem was that I installed ubuntu on /dev/sda, but in BIOS settings it was set to boot from /dev/sdb :)
I will check on that later, but how du you set in bios that the computer boots from /dev/sdb
in bios i can choose one of two HDDs to boot and they are not called /dev/sdX in there)
I will check that later, thank you.
np. just make sure that ubuntu is on the booting drive
